brands.name: FanDuel
brands.rationale: Commercial deal - locked position #1. Industry leader with 6,300 monthly searches for 'fanduel app'. Market-leading mobile experience with intuitive UI, comprehensive feature set, and industry-best same-game parlay builder.

brands.name: BetMGM
brands.rationale: Commercial deal - locked position #2. Strong brand presence with 2,500 monthly searches for 'betmgm app'. Known for excellent app performance, MGM Rewards integration, and comprehensive sports coverage.

brands.name: Bet365
brands.rationale: Massive search volume (59,000/mo for 'bet365 app') indicates dominant brand awareness. Global leader with best-in-class mobile streaming and live betting features. Recent US expansion makes this highly relevant for American bettors.

brands.name: DraftKings
brands.rationale: Major market player with 5,300 monthly searches for 'draftkings app'. Pioneer in mobile sports betting with robust DFS integration, excellent parlay builder, and strong app ratings across iOS (4.8) and Android (4.6).

brands.name: Hard Rock Bet
brands.rationale: Growing brand with 1,200 monthly searches for 'hard rock bet app'. Expanding rapidly across new states in 2024-2025. Strong loyalty program (Unity Rewards) and unique rock-and-roll branding appeals to younger demographic.

brands.name: theScore BET
brands.rationale: Recently rebranded from ESPN BET (December 2025). Still captures 1,000 monthly searches under old brand name. Best-in-class sports content integration within betting app - users can read news, check scores, and place bets seamlessly.

brands.name: BetRivers
brands.rationale: 900 monthly searches for 'betrivers app'. Strong regional presence in Midwest and Northeast states. Excellent same-game parlay builder, iRush Rewards program popular among regular bettors, competitive promotions.

brands.name: Caesars
brands.rationale: 800 monthly searches for 'caesars sportsbook app'. Legacy casino brand with trusted name recognition spanning decades. Caesars Rewards integration provides strong value proposition for app users who also visit casinos.

brands.name: Fanatics
brands.rationale: 400 monthly searches for new entrant shows rapid growth trajectory. Unique FanCash rewards that can be spent on sports merchandise - only sportsbook offering this. Strong mobile-first approach, modern UI/UX.

brands.name: Borgata
brands.rationale: 80 monthly searches for 'borgata sportsbook app' but strong regional presence in NJ/PA. Part of MGM family with reliable app infrastructure. Good option for users in limited legal states, especially casino crossover customers.
